home-work-setting.heading: What type of work setting do you typically use when working from home?

options.option_label: A dedicated work room or office
A dedicated work area (but not a separate room)
A setting not typically intended for work (e.g. dining table)

home-work-setting.heading: If you were to work from home, what type of work setting would you typically use?

options.option_label: A dedicated work room or office
A dedicated work area (but not a separate room)
A setting not typically intended for work (e.g. dining table)
